Faster Development on Rails with RailsPanel.

Published the 22 January 2013 by Thomas Romera

RailsPanel is an extension for Chrome that allow you to have development.log directly in the Developper Tool (F12).

The 1/2 step is adding in your Gemfile : 

  
group :development do
    gem 'meta_request', '0.2.1'
end
Finally, install the Chrome extension from the Chrome Store.

Enjoy !

Github : RailsPanel on Github

Thanks to @steveklabnik
